modularity.title: Modularity
modularity.description: BFG is designed as a modular system by ASDEA. Each feature is an independent plugin that can be activated or deactivated according to your needs.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Compose your engineering dashboard by choosing only the modules you need. Each project can have a different configuration.

development.title: Future Development
development.description: New modules are continuously developed by ASDEA. You will be able to expand the system's functionalities when they become available.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: The system adapts to your engineering needs, allowing for custom integrations and specific workflows for each project.

main.title: BFG Dashboard
main.description:
Your modular engineering dashboard is ready to be customized.
Explore the available modules in the side menu to get started.
